# Group together all data related to Where harrassment take place

Violence_Where = Violence_Harassment.loc[(Violence_Harassment['question_label'] == 'LAST incident of harassment in the past 12 months - Where did it happen?')
                         |  (Violence_Harassment['question_label'] == 'MOST SERIOUS incident of harassment - Where did it happen?')
                            |  (Violence_Harassment['question_label'] == 'Where did the last incident of physical / sexual attack or threat of violence happen?')
                            |  (Violence_Harassment['question_label'] == 'Where do you avoid being open about yourself as L, G, B or T for fear of being assaulted, threatened or harassed by others?')
                         | (Violence_Harassment['question_label'] == 'The MOST SERIOUS physical / sexual attack or threat of violence - Where did it happen?')]

# Create a WorldCloud (the bigger the fontsize the more the word appears)

from wordcloud import WordCloud, ImageColorGenerator
text = list(set(Violence_Where['answer']))
plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = (15,15)
wordcloud = WordCloud(max_font_size=50, 
                      max_words=100,
                      background_color="black").generate(str(text))

plt.imshow(wordcloud,interpolation="bilinear")
plt.title('Where most incidents of harassment take place', fontsize=20)
plt.axis("off")
plt.show()

# LGBT Survey - Populism and Gay Tolerance Tasks:
  • Exploratory Data Analysis
  • Graph and Analyze

    The project has the following DataSets, related to LGBTQI:

  • Kaggle Set - LGBTQI Violence and Harassment
  • ILGA Europe Index
  • GTI Index
  • HDI
  • Happiness Score
  • Populism Index in EU

    Scope:

  • Compare the sets against different variables to find correlations.

    CONTENTS:

  • 1. Load Data
  • 2. Gay Tolerance and Sexual Harassment
source.ca5911f4: ### The results from the 'Discrimination at employemnt' data are inconclusive as most answers are at the same levels. (Clicking on Countries shows data for each country separately)
source.a90c5a47: ### The results from discrimination at various places in everyfay life are a bit more encouraging as the 'No' answers are greater than the 'Yes' answers. (Clicking on Countries shows data for each country separately)
source.db0a6729: ### It seems that Fear, Shame, Family, Embarassment and Not Believing are the major reasons incidents of Sexual Harassment are not reported.
source.b4a47ccd: ### It seems that inappropriate curiosity is by far the most important problem for the LGBT community when trying to access the healthcare system. Also the 'None of the above' incidents indicate that there may be issues that need to be addressed that remain unknown. (Clicking on Countries shows data for each country separately)
source.9e7653e1: ### Once again the survey show divided people are on the matter as both 'No' and 'Yes' answers are many. (Clicking on Countries shows data for each country separately)
